This copy is not bad at all. The video is great. The only problem is the audio, It is out of sync. The only way to get the audio to sync is to watch it on your computer with VLC media player. When the audio goes out of sync just hit pause for a few seconds and then play it, it will sync for about ten minutes so you will have to periodically pause and unpause to keep it in sync. This works. Hope I helped. If you really want to see this you will follow my advice.
